nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. Low around 51, with temperatures rising to around 53 overnight. East southeast wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain before 10am, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy. High near 62, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. South southeast wind 10 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 51. South wind 10 to 16 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 10am, then rain. Cloudy, with a high near 59. South wind around 13 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a half and three quarters of an inch possible.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain before 10pm, then showers and thunderstorms between 10pm and 1am, then rain between 1am and 4am, then showers and thunderstorms. Cloudy, with a low around 48. South southwest wind 8 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

nws.name: Friday
nws.shortForecast: Showers And Thunderstorms then Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: Showers and thunderstorms before 7am, then rain. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 57. Chance of precipitation is 90%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Light Rain then Patchy Fog
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 10pm, then patchy fog. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 42.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Patchy fog before 7am. Partly sunny, with a high near 60.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Slight Chance Light Rain
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Partly sunny, with a high near 62.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 47.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain likely. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 59.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46.

nws.name: Veterans Day
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain before 5pm. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 58.
